posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
What would you do with this subrace/subclass

Knight
 
    Syntax: Knight
    Stats: +4 Strength, +2 Wisdom
    Feat Bonus: Power Attack

I was thinking a 10 Fighter 30 WM but can't find a good build

David

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Unless you are required to have 10/30 to qualify for the the subrace/subclass, you would be better off with 12 Fighter / 28 WM. Those last 2 levels of WM don't really give you anything.

posts.author: KidMiracleman
posts.content:
Oops!  Your right.  I forgot this subrace does not have to be a pure build so one could have three classes

David
